Earth-Trisolaris Organization (ETO) is a human organization dedicated to helping the Trisolarians invade Earth and destroy human civilization. The organization was founded by Ye Wenjie and Mike Evans.

AA is an astronomer who discovered that the star DX3906 had two habitable planets. Later, AA became the assistant and close friend of Cheng Xin.
Sophon is an AI robot developed by the Trisolarans to be their voice on Earth and communicate with humanity.

Natural Selection is a Stellar-class Warship. It is the flagship of the 3rd Squadron of the Asian Fleet, and it is the  largest ship of all the fleets based on gross tonnage. Natural Selection is capable of accelerating to 15% of the speed of light
Quantum is a human space warship of the Stellar-class Warships.
